products

  • It Is Healthier

    Organic ice cream is made from organically cultivated ingredients. Milk, naturally preservatives and the other agents.

  • Full Of Nutrients

    Organic ice cream contains a noticeable amount of Omega 3 fatty acids that are essential in maintaining a healthy body.

  • Make you happier

    Whether you are lactose intolerant, following a high protein diet, or restricting sugar content, everyone can enjoy ice cream.

tradition and love

how it's made?

Ice cream is a sweety frozen food. It may be made from milk and is flavoured with sugar or an alternative, and a spice, such as cocoa / vanilla / fruit.

The mixture is cooled below the freezing point of water and stirred to incorporate air spaces and to prevent ice crystals from forming. The result is a smooth, semi-solid foam that is solid at very low temperatures (below 35 °F).

We make ice cream according to our own recipe.
